short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes every website that you visit into a Dark Mode!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darkify will change the colors of any website that you view into black and white!  You are able to toggle this by just clicking the paint icon on your extension bar!  Also, this extension will stop those annoying headaches from happening!  This will also change the color of YouTube videos!  I hope that you enjoy this extension!
